#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,j,t,a,b,temp1,temp2,temp3,sum,sumr;
	cin>>t;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
	    cin>>a>>b;
	    temp1 = 0;
	    while(a!=0)
	    {
	        temp1 = a%10 + temp1*10;
	        a/=10;
	    }
	    temp2=0;
	    while(b!=0)
	    {
	        temp2 = b%10 + temp2*10;
	        b/=10;
	    }
	    sum = temp1+temp2;    
	    sumr=0;
	    while(sum!=0)
	    {
	        sumr = sumr*10 + sum%10;
	        sum/=10;
	    }
	    cout<<sumr<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
